pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Build (2017, TV show)$(br)Health: 35

Has a 5% chance to spawn from a $(l:build/mobs/touto_guardian)Touto,$(/l) $(l:build/mobs/hokuto_guardian)Hokuto,$(/l) or $(l:build/mobs/seito_guardian)Seito Guardian$(/l)$(br2)Drops$(li)2-4 $(l:build/items/full_bottle)Empty Bottles$(/l)$(li)3 $(l:build/items/smash_bottle)Smash Bottles$(/l) (80%)$(li)1 $(l:build/items/fullbottles#rabbit_full_bottle)Rabbit Fullbottle$(/l) (10%)$(li)1 $(l:build/items/fullbottles#tank_full_bottle)Tank Fullbottle$(/l) (10%)
